articles.title: ‘Bringing Dhoni as mentor is Virat’s decision. He wants to finish on a high by winning T20 World Cup': Monty Panesar - Hindustan Times
articles.description: T20 World Cup 2021: Panesar believes, Dhoni's presence will give Kohli confidence and help him live his dream of winning an ICC trophy as a captain. | Cricket
articles.content: Former England cricketer Monty Panesar feels India captain Virat Kohli must have had a big role to play in roping in the legendary MS Dhoni as mentor of the Indian side for the T20 World Cup 2021. Pa… [+2712 chars]

articles.title: 'It is far from sorted for India, will take time' - Aakash Chopra lists three major takeaways from IND vs NZ T20I series - Hindustan Times
articles.description: IND vs NZ: Rohit Sharma and his Team India side may have thumped New Zealand 3-0 to register yet another T20I series whitewash but they still have a couple of areas to sort, according to former cricketer Aakash Chopra. | Cricket
